cocktails.name: The Carrie Bradshaw Aka the Cosmopolitan
cocktails.comment: Chic and fruity, perfect for a night out!

cocktails.name: Gimlet
cocktails.comment: Tart and sweet! The perfect summer drink!.

cocktails.name: Mai-Tai
cocktails.comment: A great cocktail with the strength and character of rum harmoniously combined with fruity sweetness, rich almond and tart citrus.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.comment: A refreshing classic with a perfect balance of tangy and salty.
